annonstext:
We are looking for an Infrastructure Engineer to work together with a team of senior and highly-skilled engineers (Networking, Windows and Linux). The infrastructure Team is responsible for our 24/7 OnPrem infrastructure (Data centers, networking, compute, storage along with infrastructure-related services such as virtualization platform, load balancing, DNS, active directory, logging and monitoring). Qliro is also on a journey towards AWS, where you and the Infrastructure team will provide the foundation (DX Connectivity, Landing Zone).

In your job, you and the Infrastructure team will build and maintain the Qliro business-critical infrastructure as well as making it available for self-service consumption by the other tech teams in Qliro. This means that you will actively drive the Infrastructure as Code movement within Qliro, as well as lead by example by making the Infrastructure available as a service.

Qliro has a track record of delivering new products and services at unmatched speed. We are active in an exciting intersection of the e-commerce, payment and financial services markets. We target both leading online merchants and millions of Nordic consumers seeking superior digital payments and consumer finance products.

We believe you have:

- Expertise in Linux based environments
- Deep knowledgeable in networking and related services such as DNS, Load balancing, CDN etc.
- Expertise on Data centers and infrastructure (Data Centers, Compute, Storage, Virtualization)
- Experience in Python programming
- Fluency in Bash
- Fluency in Ansible
- Experience working with AWS services is highly beneficial
- Master’s degree in engineering, or comparable experience
- Is fluent in spoken and written English
- Valid work permit within the European Union

WOW in everything we do

Qliro offers a dynamic and fast-paced Fintech environment with teams of driven and flexible individuals. We thrive on challenges, personal growth and you will be able to excel within the company. We have been implementing agile ways of working from the get-go, evolving our ways of working over-time to constantly improve. Our software engineering teams are moving towards taking on a full end-to-end responsibility for their assets, and with the changes we are doing to create a fully programmable infrastructure as well as enabling use of Cloud, we are ready to move towards full-circle end-to-end ownership. This reduces dependencies between teams and helps us to move fast without breaking things.

We have a learning and development focused environment with an emphasis on knowledge sharing and training. We work hard to create a workplace that is diverse and inclusive with employees from over 30 countries from all over the world.

We believe in the power of collaboration and empowering each other and we strive to create a wow experience in our way of working. We see our future way of working as a hybrid way of working with a mix of working in the office and working remote. We believe in the power of meeting each other in real life and want our office to be a space for collaboration and creativity, where we can meet in person and bring out the best in one another. Together, we will ensure we continue to create WOW in everything we do.
